title: Modifiable values for the blog page.

userPicture1.title: The name of the picture that is the avatar for username1. Should be in the Img-folder.

userPicture2.title: The name of the picture that is the avatar for username2. Should be in the Img-folder.

username1.title: Username of one of the creators on the blog. It should be the same as one of the posters of the blog posts.

username2.title: Username of one of the creators on the blog. It should be the same as one of the posters of the blog posts.

quoteTime.title: The number of seconds each quote on TabQuotes is shown.

iframeList.title: List of website addresses for the jigsaws displayed on the Home tab.

answerToBeEncrypted.title: The website that is the answer for the main puzzle, see the documentation.

encryptionKey.title: Key for the Mexican Army Wheel that encrypts the 'answerToBeEncrypted.

clueDate.title: Will replace the month in all posts related to the main puzzle (see documentation). Should be one of the options in the encryptionKey.

letterFont.title: Letter font to be used to identify a course code.

letterColour.title: Letter colour to be used to identify a course code.

courseCode1Index.title: For example, the number 2 will replace every second occurance of letters in the course code inside the main puzzle post to indicate the course code.

courseCode2Index.title: For example, the number 2 will replace every second occurance of letters in the course code inside the main puzzle post to indicate the course code.

threeDinosaurs.title: Names of three dinosaurs were the first letters combine to a course code.

hintDinosaurs.title: A hidden hint for the meaning of the dinosaurs.

hintCourses.title: A hidden hint to tell the player that finding course codes is a good idea.

redHintPicture.title: The first number is the index of which picture is chosen in the second list.

blueHintPicture.title: The first number is the index of which picture is chosen in the second list.

greenHintPicture.title: The first number is the index of which picture is chosen in the second list.

jigsawSudoku.title: The Sudoku the player gets the course code numbers from. Should be in the Img-folder.

parkEntrance.title: Picture of the start to directions. See documentation for more information about the puzzle. Should be in the Img-folder.

directions.title: The directions from the parkEntrance. See documenationt for details.

chatAddress.title: The website address to the chat.

postsPerPage.title: The amount of posts displayed on one page of the blog before you need to switch page.
